Product.Product_Name: Black Diamond Shadow Climbing Shoes, Black, 4
Product.Long_Description: Black Diamond Climb Shadow ing Shoes Black 4 BD570112BLAK0401. Built for overhanging sport routes and hard bouldering the Shadow features an aggressive downturned last with our sticky rubber thats moldedinspired by the way we forge our carabinersand not cut from one sheet of rubber. This is our engineered solution to optimize our shoes rubber and rands for weight consistency and comfort. The Shadow features a stretch resistant microfiber upper and the shoe's vamp features an innovative combination of printed and molded high friction rubber. The molded rubber is strategically placed in high-use areas while the printed rubber minimizes bulk and in combination these rubbers provide better top of foot dexterity and purchase when toe-hooking. The tongue is made from our Engineered Knit Technology which is exceptionally breathable and increases mobility and comfort. With a minimalist midsole the Shadow is ultra-sensitive and allows you to pull in on steep terrain.

Product.Product_Name: Black Diamond Aspect Climbing Shoes, Aluminum, 4
Product.Long_Description: Black Diamond Climb Aspect ing Shoes Aluminum 4 BD570111ALUM0401. Built with the highest grade European leather upper the Aspects balance comfort with performance using innovative designs that subtly set it apart. Lace up a pair and you'll notice that the leather upper slightly covers the laces on the outside of the foot specifically designed for protection during abrasive jamming. The shoe's tongue is made from our Engineered Knit Technology which adds breathability and comfort. The knit also extends to the outside of the shoe to just under the rand line to offer extra padded protection for foot jams. The lateral stabilizer rands increase precision by keeping your foot from rolling when pressure is applied to the outside or inside edges. The Aspect's stiff and durable rubber is unique in that it's molded inspired by the way we forge our carabiners and not cut from one sheet of rubber. This is our engineered solution to optimize our shoe's rubber and rands for weight consistency and comfort. The Aspect's medium-flex midsole adds support without sacrificing comfort. So next time you're eyeing that trad line consider the Aspects a part of your rack.

Product.Product_Name: Black Diamond Momentum Men's Climbing Shoes, Ash, 5
Product.Long_Description: Black Diamond Climb Momentum Men's ing Shoes Ash 5 BD570101ASH00501. With an upper fabric that consists entirely of our Engineered Knit Technology the Momentum provides stretch where you need it support where it matters and all around exceptional breathability. We've also added a micro-fiber liner to the front of the shoe to minimize stretch and maximize comfort. The Momentum's durable rubber is unique in that it's molded inspired by the way we forge our carabiners versus cut from one sheet of rubber. This is our engineered solution to optimize our shoe's rubber and rands for weight consistency and comfort. Built for all-day comfort on moderate routes boulders or gym sessions the Momentum features a soft-flex midsole for sensitivity and is the perfect entry level climbing shoe.

Product.Product_Name: Black Diamond Focus Men's Climbing Shoes, Rust, 5
Product.Long_Description: Black Diamond Climb Focus Men's ing Shoes Rust 5 BD570102RUST0501. With the highest grade European leather upper and our Engineered Knit Technology tongue the Focus provides breathability and durability. We also printed high friction rubber on the vamp area of the shoe this innovative process minimizes bulk while maximizing dexterity and grip for toe-hooking. The sole of the Focus is our stiff durable rubber that's molded inspired by the way we forge our carabiners and not cut from one sheet of rubber. This is our engineered solution to optimize our shoe's rubber and rands for weight consistency and comfort. Its stiff-flex midsole is ideal for micro-edging. The Focus also features medial and lateral stabilizer rands to increase precision by keeping your foot from rolling when pressure is applied to the outside or inside edges.

This game changing mid-height edging machine will take you out of a technical thin hands to rattley fingers crack and out on to the diciest dime edges you can find. Thin padding in the ankle and above the toes protects you in the cracks and the patented P3 platform delivers sensitive yet powerful edging abilities. The toes flat fit is perfect for comfortable crack climbing and the ventilated tongue and lateral rand perforations promote air-flow. We worked with Vibram on a new rubber compound that works best for technical edging and developed the XS Edge compound which holds an edge better on sharp micro edges. This shoe was designed in collaboration with La Sportiva climbing athleteTOMMY CALDWELL.

Lightweight and collapsible you can hang these from the back of your harness or stash 'em in your climbing pack no problem. The EVA midsole still gives you a plush ride on the descent. We use a zonal weave upper with different construction zones for breathability and light weight support. Long routes in Red Rocks or descending into the Black? Consider the Iguana.

Product.Product_Name: Scarpa Origin Climbing Shoes - Men's, Iron Gray, Medium, 38
Product.Long_Description: Scarpa Climb Origin ing Shoes - Men's Iron Gray Medium 38 70025/000Igry38. It gives rise to the genetic building blocks that shape our climbing lives. The Origin offers a lush leather upper giving a feeling of padded luxury that is rarely found in a shoe aimed at encouraging people to start climbing. The flat profile and relatively relaxed randing ease the climbers feet into a cocoon of comfort. The hook-and-loop closure keeps the foot snug and well positioned during use. The Origin introduces SCARPAs Vision rubber a proprietary compound that is both sticky and resilient to all the conditions that new climbers feet will experience.

Product.Product_Name: Scarpa Maestro Mid Climbing Shoes - Women's, Malva/Milk, Medium, 35
Product.Long_Description: Scarpa Climb Maestro Mid ing Shoes - Women's Malva/Milk Medium 34.5 70053/002MalMlk345. The supportive IPC-Tension active rand innovative Eco leather patterning and protection where you need it combine to offer versatility across a wide range of classic climbs

Product.Product_Name: Scarpa Cosmo Approach Shoes - Women's, Jade/Salmon, 36
Product.Long_Description: Scarpa Approach Shoes Cosmo - Women's Jade/Salmon 36 32550352JadSal36.

Product.Product_Name: Scarpa Maestrale RS Alpine Touring Boot - Mens, White/Black/Lime, 25
Product.Long_Description: Scarpa Alpine Touring Boots Maestrale RS Alpine Touring Boot - Mens White/Black/Lime 25. An all-new ski/walk mechanism makes switching from downhill to tour mode super easy and also results in a more robust overall system. Range of motion is 37 degrees impressive for a boot with a 120 flex index and a weight of 3 pounds 7 ounces. Other new features include a stouter power strap with a cut-out that makes adjustment a snap and updated buckles which are oversized for ease of use. Finer points include SCARPA's innovative Axial Alpine tongue design polyamide construction which contributes to the stiff flex Quick Step tech fittings and a stiff SCARPA Intuition liner. These hard-charging boots are designed for backcountry skiers who like to drive big skis or seek out steep descents but want no compromises on the up track either.

Product.Product_Name: Scarpa Freedom RS 130 Ski Boots, Orange/Black, 27.5
Product.Long_Description: "Scarpa Alpine Touring Boots Freedom RS 130 Ski Boots Orange/Black 27.5 12010/5011OrgBlk275. Meet the Freedom RS First retune the cuff in a stiffer polyamide material for less lateral flex and more control. Then bump the forward flex up to 130 and use a custom liner thermo-moldable in the lower and a race-inspired reinforced upper. The Mountain Plus sole mates with tech-style bindings but can be swapped for the Piste a straight-up alpine sole. Enormous range of movement in walk mode more control than your mother-in-law wants at Thanksgiving and the same reliable hardware we use on the SL Freedom RS. Get ready to send."

Product.Product_Name: Scarpa Ribelle Tech OD Mountaineering Boots - Men's, Black/Orange, Medium, 40.5
Product.Long_Description: Scarpa Footwear Ribelle Tech OD Mountaineering Boots - Men's Black/Orange Medium 40.5.

Product.Product_Name: Scarpa Vapor Climbing Shoes - Women's, Maldive, Medium, 37
Product.Long_Description: Scarpa Climb Vapor ing Shoes - Women's Maldive Medium 37 70035/002Mal37. The Vapors stiff platform features minimal stitching to increase comfort and eliminate hotspots.

Product.Product_Name: Scarpa Origin Climbing Shoes - Women's, Green Blue/Smoke, Medium, 36
Product.Long_Description: Scarpa Climb Origin ing Shoes - Women's Green Blue/Smoke Medium 36 70025/002GbluSmk36. It gives rise to the genetic building blocks that shape our climbing lives. The Origin offers a lush leather upper giving a feeling of padded luxury that is rarely found in a shoe aimed at encouraging people to start climbing. The flat profile and relatively relaxed randing ease the climbers feet into a cocoon of comfort. The hook-and-loop closure keeps the foot snug and well positioned during use. The Origin introduces SCARPAs Vision rubber a proprietary compound that is both sticky and resilient to all the conditions that new climbers feet will experience.

Product.Product_Name: So iLL The Street LV Climbing Shoe - Women's, Black Seafoam, 10
Product.Long_Description: So iLL Climb The Street LV ing Shoe - Women's Black Seafoam 10 STREETLVHALFHALF10. The LV (lower volume) provides a tighter fit for those with a more narrow foot width providing better heel tension and higher performance. Designed with So ill's Dark Matter Rubber in seafoam green the Street (LV) features minimal stretch and a thin midsole which provides a softer more sensitive fit.

Product.Product_Name: So iLL The One Climbing Shoe - Men's, Blue, 10.5
Product.Long_Description: So iLL Climb The One ing Shoe - Men's Blue 10.5 THEONE105. The One is hand crafted and features two newly developed technologies. For the first time ever in the production of climbing shoes The One boasts a welded NO SEW UPPER - in addition to the thick padded tongue and lining - for maximum comfort. For warming up and additional support the tongue is banded on each side. This technology is first for the rock shoe industry at large.

Product.Product_Name: So iLL Setter Shoe Climbing Shoe - Men's, Black Olive, 11.5
Product.Long_Description: So iLL Climb Setter Shoe ing Shoe - Men's Black Olive 11.5 SETTERSHOE115. The Setter Shoe is an innovative routesetting shoe featuring a Dark Matter Rubber sticky outsole for those long days on the wall. The collapsible heel offers the opportunity to give you a break between problems while the climbing zone and optimal midsole stiffness make for easier forerunning. Built on a street shoe last this lightweight fashionable upper will get yo to the gym through the gym and wherever you tread beyond.

Product.Product_Name: So iLL The New Zero Climbing Shoe - Men's, Grey, 7
Product.Long_Description: So iLL Climb The New Zero ing Shoe - Men's Grey 7 NEWZERO7. The softest highest performing shoe in our line. The New Zero performs on steep overhanging bouldering as well as the smallest of smears. Designed for advanced and elite climbers The New Zero allows for full sensitivity to nuanced footholds and technical bouldering demands.

Product.Product_Name: So iLL The Street Climbing Shoe - Men's, Black, 9
Product.Long_Description: So iLL Climb The Street ing Shoe - Men's Black 9 STREET9. Designed with synthetic materials for minimal stretch and a thin midsole for a softer more sensitive fit the Street is an extremely lightweight aggressive climbing shoe.

Product.Product_Name: Zamberlan 126 Sparrow RR Alpine Approach Shoe - Women's, Light Blue, 43 EU / 11 US
Product.Long_Description: 126 Sparrow RR Alpine Approach Shoe - Women's Light Blue 43 EU / 11 US 126LB-W Size 43 / 11. Polyester mesh fabric lining to enhance breathability. It is equipped with rubber toe reinforcement to provide better protection. Double-density EVA wedge to ensure additional lightweight shock absorption comfort and cushioning. Zamberlan Vibram Tech Approach outsole with Grip Climbing System to maximize grip on both rocky conditions and trails alike.

Product.Product_Name: Zamberlan Karka Evo RR Mountaineering Boot - Men's, Black/Orange, 43 EU / 9 US, size 43 / 9
Product.Long_Description: Zamberlan Footwear Karka Evo RR Mountaineering Boot - Men's Black/Orange 43 EU / 9 US Size 43 /. Featuring Zamberlan's new carbon-fiber insole technology the new 6000 Karka EVO RR is roughly 12percent lighter than the previous version.

Product.Product_Name: Zamberlan Baltoro GTX RR Mountaineering Boots - Men's, Graphite/Orange, Medium, 10
Product.Long_Description: Zamberlan Footwear Baltoro GTX RR Mountaineering Boots - Men's Graphite/Orange Medium 10. The slim design is wrapped around the foot with Zamberlan's anatomical ZTECH last and fit adding to its precision. The Baltoro is an exceptional companion for long backpacking and hunting trips in harsh backcountry conditions and perhaps your new best friend.
